Hello,
I was reading around the docs and wiki and couldnt seem to find anything on
seed configuration. I see theres methods to manage sheets. So is it possible
to add/remove seeds from a crawl job via JMX?  Or is this something that
will be supported in 2.2.0?  Thank you,
-Ryan

--000e0cd3f85809b8840465f66d8b
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
